title: Magic Pouch
description: A magical pouch that contains all your found gadgets! Call it with Crouch (L3) + Activate (A).
location: Can be found in the Shrine of Resurrection.

title: Coiled Sword
description: A shimmering, serpentine sword that trades rupees to upgrade your stats. Call it with Crouch (L3) + Attack (X).
location: Can be found in the Shrine of Resurrection.

title: Spellbook
description: A tome that containing the knowledge of a great spellcaster. Read it (switch your active spell crystal) with Activate (A) + Dpad Down.
location: Can be found in the Shrine of Resurrection.

title: Twilight Mirror
description: This magic mirror can be used to summon all npc characters that have decided to join you on your journey. Call it with Crouch (L3) + Jump (Y).
location: Can be found in the Shrine of Resurrection.
